name: Lorraine
subtitle: Grand Elidoran Scholar
description: The elf druid who joined the Human Allied Forces when the Dark Lord invaded. Communes with nature and attacks enemies using trees.
story: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the Demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis Continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said that even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were all once her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora Forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the Holy Sword.

inn.idle: Do not be afraid. Ye may be much stronger.

recruit.greet: I'm Lorraine, an Elidora Elf. Salutations.
talk: May the blessing of mother nature light thy way.
Human beings are astounding creatures, but you have a serious weakness. You are ruled by greed and cannot resist temptation.

affinity.greet: I always welcome the chance to spend time with you.
talk: A major crossroad awaits you. Light and shadow... will converge into one path...
Unlike Elves, who are known for their longevity, humans live shorter lives, but they shine brighter in their prime.
affinity.gift: I'll consider it as a gift given out of your generosity.

relationship.greet: You have grown strong, just, and pure.
talk: You seem to have the purest soul I've seen in a while.
It would be nice if these times of peaceful enjoyment could last forever...but that would be a vice.
I will never forget you. Not as the Sage, but as a simple elf.

uw.name: World Tree's Will, Roburu
description: Every 7 sec, deals 40% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 10%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 48% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 12%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 57% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 14%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 69% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 17%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 83% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 20%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 100% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 25%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
uw.story: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen one. The branch radiates with eternal life, granting immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the Stone of the Forest, an Elven treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

s1.name: Thornbush Forest
s1.description: Attacks 3 times at random, dealing {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and inflicting 1 stack of Poison with each attack.

books.2: Leaves 2 stacks of Poison upon a Critical Hit.

s1.dark: Enemies with 5 or more stacks of Poison are shackled for 3 sec upon hit.

ut.name: Book of Life
description: [Thornbush Forest] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and Cooldown by 0.8 sec.
[Thornbush Forest] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and Cooldown by 1 sec.
[Thornbush Forest] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and Cooldown by 1.2 sec.
[Thornbush Forest] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and Cooldown by 1.4 sec.
[Thornbush Forest] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and Cooldown by 1.7 sec.
[Thornbush Forest] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and Cooldown by 2 sec.
ut.story: The Book containing knowledge about all life in the forest. A magical book passed down among the guardians of the World Tree since ancient times. After being in the hands of Elidoran sages for a long time, Lorraine now has it in safekeeping.

s2.name: Tangled Vine
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in a straight line, stacking 2 Poison and shackling them for {1} sec. After some time, deals a large amount of DMG based on the number of Poison stacks.

books.2: Target takes {0}% increased M.DMG for the duration of skill.

s2.dark: Enemies hit by the final explosion effect are stunned for 2 sec.

ut.name: Deadly Belladonna
description: [Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 200 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 240 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 290 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 350 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 420 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 500 MP from the affected enemy.
ut.story: The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna. It's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

s3.name: Wrath of the Forest
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them down for 3 sec. Enemies inflicted by Poison takes {1}% more DMG per every stack.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s3.dark: Enemies with 5 or more stacks of Poison lose their positive effects.

ut.name: Root of the World Tree
description: [Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 20%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 24%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 29%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 35%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 42%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 50%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
ut.story: Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of the deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

s4.name: Blade Leaf
s4.description: When dealing a normal attack, attacks a random enemy 3 times with a 30% chance of inflicting {0} M.DMG and 1 stack of Poison for 20 seconds. Poison inflicts a total of {1} M.DMG over 20 seconds.
s4.light: Poison stack maximum is changed to 6.
s4.dark: There is a 20% chance that hit enemies are shackled for 2 sec.

ut.name: Terrarium of Circulation
description: [Blade Leaf] Increases activation chance by 20%. Targets take 10% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blade Leaf] Increases activation chance by 20%. Targets take 12% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blade Leaf] Increases activation chance by 20%. Targets take 14% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blade Leaf] Increases activation chance by 20%. Targets take 17% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blade Leaf] Increases activation chance by 20%. Targets take 21% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blade Leaf] Increases activation chance by 20%. Targets take 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
ut.story: A terrarium made with a broken World Tree twig. As breaking of twigs of the World Tree is considered very bad luck, they are normally purified and discarded. However, Lorraine received a new revelation from it and decided to make a small terrarium out of it.

t5.dark: Every 5 sec, targets all enemies and attacks with 'Thornbush Forest' with 30% chance on each enemy.
